Question: This person died on 23 April 1616 and was survived by his wife and two daughters.
Hints: At the age of 18, this person married the 26-year-old Anne Hathaway.
This person combined the two throughout his career, with Romeo and Juliet perhaps the best example of the mixing of the styles.
The Romantic poets attempted to revive this personan verse drama, though with little success.
